Yes! I Updated It When In The Installation it Asks For Check About Updates i checked And Installed The Updates. Do You Have Any other Method To Update. And Thanks For This Torrent Again Very Much. I Think You Are Indian.

And Please Tell Me What Does SATA Drivers Mean.

@DJPidu
I'm not Indian :)
I'm still reading and testing about Windows 7 slipstreaming.
Didn't make my mind up yet which way is the best!
Regarding your question about SATA drivers:
There's 2 type of hard disk drives (3 actually), the old type which is called IDE or PATA, the new type which is called SATA, and SSD.
In the original Windows XP SP3 disk there is no SATA drivers, so you will not be able to install it on a new PC which has SATA hard disk.
That's why I slipstream SATA drivers into Windows XP SP3 disk.
Hope you got it :)
